mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Put and Take", "Down South", "Yorkshire Pudding" ROUND DANCES "Teton Mountain Stomp" and"Beautiful Ohio" SPECIAL FEATURES "Hail 1954! (Show Annual Message)", "Dance Programs Across the Country", "Asilomar 1954 Dates", "Teaching Plan Presented", "More about Square Dance 'Families'", "Dallas in April", and "More Big Square Dance Events of 1954". This edition also includes the The regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square Dance Picture", "Caller of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor).
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
